channel.title: Coding on aichi.

item.title: Tricks
item.description: Find the number of digits in a number - Optimal Solution : The logarithmic base 10 of a positive integers gives the number of digits in n. We add 1 to the result to ensure that the count is correct even for numbers that are powers of 10. public class pattern9 { public static void main(String args[]){ int n = 89765; int val = (int)(Math.log10(n))+1; System.out.print("For "+n+" the number of digits is: "+val); } } Finding the signed right shift (by 1,2,3…) : So, for a decimal number (ex: 120), the values will be the integer division by 2 at each consecutive step.
